35.2. [Odo of Cluny] Exceptio in Moralibus.
Exception | Moralia
Manuscripts:
3. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 2455, f. 1-187. saec. xiii; Limoges, St. Martial. (S)
5. Toulouse, Bibliothèque municipale 41.
Bibliography:
1. P. Chiese, “Benedetto di Aniane epitomatore di Gregorio Magno e commentatore dei Re,” Revue Bénédictine 117 (2007), 294-338. Argues that the so-called Epitome Marrier (item 35.1) is actually compiled by Benedict of Aniane, who also compiled a commentary on the book of Kings preserved in Paris BnF lat. 15679.
